entities.name: funder
entities.description: Entity providing funding for the project

entities.name: industry
entities.description: Market sector where the company operates

entities.name: project team
entities.description: Group of people working on the development project

entities.name: local community
entities.description: Geographic area where the company operates

entities.name: region
entities.description: Geographic area affected by the project

entities.name: product lifecycle
entities.description: Stages from creation to disposal of products

entities.name: employment
entities.description: Number of jobs created or maintained

components.name: company current state analysis
components.description: Assessment of market position, profitability, production and premises

components.name: operating environment analysis
components.description: Evaluation of industry changes affecting the company

components.name: development project need
components.description: Justification for implementing the development project

components.name: development project description
components.description: Detailed explanation of what will be done in the project

components.name: development project impact
components.description: Expected improvements to competitiveness, employment or profitability

components.name: marketing strategy for project
components.description: Approach to reaching new customers through the project

components.name: sales strategy for project
components.description: Approach to selling through the project

components.name: customer acquisition plan
components.description: Method for attracting new customers via the project

components.name: target group identification
components.description: Definition of key customer segments for the project

components.name: project risk assessment
components.description: Evaluation of risks specific to the development project

components.name: social responsibility statement
components.description: Impact on employee well-being and local community

components.name: economic responsibility statement
components.description: Impact on regional vitality and employment

components.name: environmental responsibility statement
components.description: Energy efficiency, raw material savings and product lifecycle

components.name: financial planning
components.description: Project financial plan and profit forecast

components.name: profitability analysis
components.description: Assessment of project's financial performance

components.name: competitiveness improvement
components.description: How the project enhances competitive position

components.name: employment impact
components.description: How the project affects job creation or retention

components.name: energy efficiency measures
components.description: Steps to reduce energy consumption

components.name: raw material savings
components.description: Steps to reduce material consumption

components.name: product lifecycle management
components.description: Approach to managing product from creation to disposal

components.name: quality requirement compliance
components.description: Ensuring products meet required standards

components.name: industry change adaptation
components.description: How the company responds to industry changes

components.name: competition response
components.description: How the company deals with competitive pressure

components.name: customer demand fulfillment
components.description: How the project meets market needs

components.name: regional vitality enhancement
components.description: How the project strengthens the local economy

components.name: local community impact
components.description: How the project affects the local area

components.name: employee well-being improvement
components.description: How the project enhances staff welfare

components.name: project implementation plan
components.description: Timeline and steps for executing the project

systems.name: business analysis system
systems.description: Framework for evaluating current business state

systems.name: marketing system
systems.description: Framework for reaching customers through the project

systems.name: risk management system
systems.description: Framework for identifying and mitigating project risks

systems.name: ESG system
systems.description: Framework for environmental, social and governance considerations

systems.name: stakeholder management system
systems.description: Framework for managing relationships with stakeholders

systems.name: sustainability system
systems.description: Framework for environmental and social responsibility

constraints.description: Project must have clear financial plan and profit forecast
Project must improve competitiveness, employment or profitability
Project must comply with ESG requirements
Project must have clearly defined need and implementation plan
Project must include strategy for reaching new customers
Project must include specific risk assessment
Project must consider impact on employee well-being and local community
Project must address energy efficiency and environmental impact
Project must consider impact on regional vitality and employment

metadata.title: Template: Business Plan (Development Project)
metadata.description: Template for companies applying for funding for a separate development project
